fields.name: "Garden" Family Assorted Biscuit
fields.description: A big box of Family Assorted Biscuit from the brand Garden. The most basic gift you could bring to a Chinese New Year gathering. You can feel the judgy looks...

fields.name: Silver Tongue
fields.description: Gives you the Tongue of Silver and the ability to spew good wishes to your elders non-stop, making them very happy.

fields.name: Deep Pocket
fields.description: Give you an ultra-deep pocket to carry more red packets. No one knows how many red packets you've already got.

fields.name: Partner
fields.description: Your parents and relatives are so happy to see you've come home with a partner so they're giving you double the red packets.

fields.name: Mediocre Gift Set from Supermarkets
fields.description: A mediocre gift set you bought from the supermarket, slightly better than "Garden" Family Assorted Biscuits. You are starting the feel the respect from everyone in the room.

fields.name: Friend
fields.description: You brought a good friend to the party, they entertain your parents and relatives with their jokes

fields.name: Traditional Jacket
fields.description: You wear a traditional jacket to the party that screams "Chinese New Year", you get nods of approvals from the elders in the room

fields.name: Home-made Turnip Cake
fields.description: You brought your home-made turnip cake to the party, everyone is telling you how delicious it is but might be secretly thinking that you are cheap on the preserved meats...

fields.name: Fancy Gift Set from Sogo
fields.description: A fancy gift set you bought from the Japanese shops in the basement of Sogo. You feel the massive amount of respect coming from everybody in the room.

fields.name: Baby
fields.description: You brought a baby to the party, everyone goes apeshit for the baby, no one notices your existence at this point. It's all about the baby.
